thread.title: Best parking deal and excellent location
thread.title_full: Best parking deal and excellent location - Review of Broadway at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: alice_lenthe
title: Best parking deal and excellent location
text: My favorite part about this hotel was the excellent parking deal they have with the parking garage across the street. It's only $26 for 24 hours, which I think especially for this location is an amazing deal. The hotel is right in Times Square, so the location is perfect also. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful - and I mean everyone from the people at the front desk to the people working in the breakfast area. I don't know about their rates for the rest of the year, but I thought the price per night was great, especially since it also includes breakfast (which is also decent - toast, bagels, waffles, pancakes, cereal, so plenty of options). The size of our room was good considering it's New York City, but we had a king bed, so I'm not sure if all rooms are like that. We had no concerns regarding the cleanliness, although overall aspect is a little dated. I would come back to this hotel.
